name: ch-api-client-kotlin
description: Openapi generated kotlin client for CloudHospital

scripts.build: openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 5.0.0 && openapi-generator-cli generate -g kotlin -i https://api-int.icloudhospital.com/swagger/v1/swagger.json -o . --additional-properties=serializationLibrary=gson --type-mappings=java.time.OffsetDateTime=java.time.LocalDateTime
scripts.build-retrofit2: openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 5.0.0 && openapi-generator-cli generate -g kotlin -i https://api-int.icloudhospital.com/swagger/v1/swagger.json -o . --additional-properties=serializationLibrary=gson --library jvm-retrofit2 --type-mappings=java.time.OffsetDateTime=java.time.LocalDateTime

author: hyounoosung@gmail.com
